about.subtitle: Passionate about how things work under the hood.
about.intro: Hello! I'm Miko≈Çaj, an indie game developer with a passion for creating the best games powered by best code.
paragraphs: In more than 4 years, I've gained a lot of experience in programming. With each project I learn something new or improved what I had already known. My adventure with game development started with the desire to improve a game I was playing and that's how the 'TheHidden' project was born.
I specialize in game mechanics programming, optimization and testing. I work using the Unity engine, but it's not the only thing I know ;)
When I'm not coding, I'm either riding my moped or fixing it. For relaxation, I read books.
